column4: No one knows what the default bios setting for AGP aperture setting is? - im pretty sure it was 128mb... :))
I had mine set at 928mb haha
yeah, that's too big.  it was either 64 or 128.  i honestly don't recall
Yeah I would like to set "bios default" but.. that will change all my tweaking and I do not want that... i'll go ask a graphic room
